message.message:
Chatbot available commands.

"/help": List available commands

To get the latest measurement from sensors and device status:
"/TH1" or "/TH2": Display latest temperature measurement from TH1 or TH2.
"/HVAC1" or "/HVAC2": Display latest energy measurement from HVAC1 or HVAC2 and the status of the device.
"/MiAC1" or "/MiAC2": Display latest energy measurement from MiAC1 or MiAC2 and the status of the device.
"/Etot": Display latest total energy measurement from Etot.
"/W1": Display latest water measurement from W1 and the status of the device.
"/alarm": Display status of the alarm.

To change the status of a device:
"/HVAC1_comp" or "/HVAC2_comp": Change the status of the aircondition devices.
"/MiAC1_comp" or "/MiAC2_comp": Change the status of the other electric devices.
"/W1_comp": Change the status of the water consumption device.
"/alarm_comp": Arm or disarm alarm.

The above commands should always return a message.
